subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: The Kings, losers of 12 of their last 15 games, won in overtime after overcoming double-digit deficits, leaving the Knicks to slink into the All-Star break.
snippet: The Kings, losers of 12 of their last 15 games, won in overtime after overcoming double-digit deficits, leaving the Knicks to slink into the All-Star break.
